subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Panasonic RR DR60 IC recorder on Ebay!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Why is this such a prized DVR?  I don't see that you can even download the 
audio to your computer.

I paid about $60 for a brand-new Olympus VN-960PC.  It records 6 hours in 
hi-quality mode and comes with USB connector cable and software to copy 
your files to your computer.

I've also used it to record ham radio conversations, Morse code and bird 
calls and it does an excellent job for all of those. Radio Shack carries 
similar models made by Olympus now.

Zack

On Wed, 28 Nov 2007, judy_in_hollywood wrote:

> Hi All, For those who have money to get it . . . . this is on Ebay = to 
> get EVP's . . . . only bad part is it's $575. + S/H!  =Judy=
>
